Fvid2_PosConfig layerPos
 

Detailed Description

Video Pipe Position Configuration in Overlay.

Field Documentation

Fvid2_PosConfig CSL_DssOverlayPipePosCfg::layerPos

Position of the layer described using Fvid2_PosConfig

startX:
X position of the layer The first pixel on the left of the screen has the X-position 0

startY:
Y position of the layer The line at the top has the Y-position 0
